personal.name: Vijay Wade
personal.tagline: Helping teams build better products through Agile thinking.
personal.description: Founder and Agile practitioner focused on organizational agility, leadership, and product execution.

seo.title: Vijay Wade - Agile Coach & Founder
seo.description: Founder at AgileWaters Consulting and Recrui8. Agile coach and leadership mentor helping teams build better products.

contact.status: Currently based in India. Open for Agile Consulting and Senior PO roles.

content.emphasis: Agility is about people, not processes.
content.paragraph: I focus on enabling teams to think clearly, collaborate effectively, and deliver outcomes instead of just outputs.
My work bridges leadership, execution, and continuous improvement. I believe real transformation happens when clarity meets accountability.

projects.title: Enterprise Agile Transformation
projects.description: Led an end-to-end Agile transformation for a mid-to-large enterprise, aligning leadership, teams, and delivery practices.
projects.focus: Organizational agility, leadership alignment, Scrum & Kanban adoption
projects.outcome: Improved delivery predictability, faster release cycles, and stronger cross-team collaboration.

projects.title: Product Delivery & Execution Coaching
projects.description: Coached product managers and engineering teams to improve product discovery, prioritization, and execution.
projects.focus: Product management, backlog refinement, outcome-driven delivery
projects.outcome: Clearer product roadmaps, reduced waste, and improved customer-focused outcomes.

projects.title: Agile Leadership Enablement
projects.description: Worked with senior leaders to build an Agile mindset focused on empowerment, accountability, and continuous improvement.
projects.focus: Agile leadership, team empowerment, decision-making clarity
projects.outcome: Leaders enabled teams instead of controlling them, resulting in higher engagement and ownership.

experience.description: Leading Agile consulting, coaching teams and organizations on agile transformation, leadership, and delivery excellence.
Focused on structured hiring, talent assessment, and industryâ€“academia collaboration.

Worked with multiple organizations as an Agile Coach, enabling teams to adopt Agile practices, improve collaboration, and deliver value consistently. Coached Scrum Masters, Product Owners, and engineering teams while supporting leadership in building an Agile mindset.

Led cross-functional teams as a Delivery Lead and Scrum Master, facilitating Agile ceremonies, improving delivery predictability, and supporting teams in continuous improvement. Acted as a bridge between business stakeholders and engineering teams.

recommendations.name: Gaurav Srivastav
recommendations.content: I had the pleasure of working with Vijay at Persistent Systems, where he reported to me as a Software Developer. Vijay is an exceptionally talented engineer with a strong foundation in both backend and frontend development. His ability to design scalable systems and write clean, maintainable code consistently impressed me. What sets Vijay apart is his proactive approach to problem-solving and his eagerness to take on challenging tasks. He demonstrated excellent collaboration skills, working seamlessly with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time. Vijay is also a quick learner who stays updated with the latest technologies and best practices. I highly recommend Vijay for any software development role. He would be a valuable asset to any team.

recommendations.name: Ajit Shingate
recommendations.content: I had the privilege of working with Vijay Wade at Persistent Systems, and I can confidently say that he is one of the most talented and dedicated professionals I have had the pleasure of collaborating with. Vijay possesses a rare combination of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and a genuine passion for software development. His ability to quickly grasp complex concepts and translate them into efficient, scalable solutions is truly impressive.

recommendations.name: Sahil Singh
recommendations.content: I had the pleasure of working with Vijay at Persistent, and I can confidently say he's a natural problem solver with strong coding skills. He approaches challenges with a calm, thoughtful mindset and consistently delivers clean, efficient solutions. What really stands out is his ability to collaborate effectivelyâ€”he's always willing to help and brings positive energy to the team.

recommendations.content: I have worked with Vijay at Persistent Systems, and I can say that his proficiency in backend, frontend, and cloud technologies like AWS makes him an invaluable asset to any team. He consistently delivers robust and efficient solutions, and his approach to problem-solving is both innovative and practical. I highly recommend Vijay for any challenging software development role.

recommendations.name: Tanmay Bhole
recommendations.content: Working with Vijay at Persistent Systems was truly a rewarding experience. His expertise in full-stack development, particularly in React, Node.js, and AWS, is exceptional. Vijay has a remarkable ability to tackle complex problems with innovative solutions while maintaining clean and efficient code. What stands out most is his collaborative spirit and eagerness to share knowledge with the team. He's always willing to help and brings a positive, solution-oriented mindset to every challenge. I highly recommend Vijay for any software development roleâ€”he's a skilled engineer and a great team player.

recommendations.content: I had the pleasure of working with Vijay at Persistent Systems, where his technical expertise and problem-solving abilities truly stood out. Vijay is highly skilled in full-stack development, with a strong command of technologies like React, Node.js, and AWS. He consistently delivered high-quality, scalable solutions and was always ready to tackle complex challenges with a positive and collaborative attitude. His dedication to continuous learning and his ability to mentor others make him a valuable asset to any team. I highly recommend Vijay for any software engineering role.
